# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a context that belongs to the specified model container.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ container: ModelContainer)
```

## Parameters

- **container**: The model container to associate with the initialized context.

## Discussion

Use the context’s [doc://com.apple.SwiftData/documentation/SwiftData/ModelContext/container] property to access the model container after initializtion.

## Creating a model context

- **ModelContainer**: An object that manages an app’s schema and model storage configuration.
